definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

sentences.english: On such a hot summer, another good news arrived at Somso.
sentences.chinese: 热情似火的夏天，西堡酒庄又传来喜讯。

sentences.english: This can be the winery or the brand name.
sentences.chinese: 可以是酒庄或品牌的名称。

sentences.english: The winery uses ecological methods and harvests the grapes late and by hand.
sentences.chinese: 酒庄以生态科学种植葡萄，并且手工采摘晚收型葡萄。

sentences.english: Evolving the style of DP is also his decision, he says.
sentences.chinese: 进一步改良酒庄风格也是吉奥夫若的决定。

sentences.english: Other books can also be useful for the next visit to the wine store.
sentences.chinese: 还有些书对那些希望探访酒庄的人有用。

sentences.english: When you step into Somso chateau, A horse-drawn carriage will be the first one to warmly welcome you.
sentences.chinese: 当你步入西堡酒庄，第一个迎接你的将会是一架马车。

sentences.english: We have found that this is a sign of a highly personal winery.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现，潍坊专业翻译这标志着这些酒庄极有个性。

sentences.english: I'm going to a wine region; what wineries should I visit?
sentences.chinese: 我要去一个葡萄酒产区，应该去哪些酒庄呢？

sentences.english: Our next stop is the exquisitely tasteful Massaya winery.
sentences.chinese: 我们的下一站是精巧雅致的Massaya酒庄。

sentences.english: Each at extreme and opposite ends of the Yarra Valley.
sentences.chinese: 两个酒庄分别位于亚拉山谷的尽头和它的对面。

sentences.english: Merlot and Syrash is Chateau Lasogity's signature wines.
sentences.chinese: 美乐和西拉是这个酒庄的代表作。

sentences.english: This article tells how a winery set the price for a bottle of wine.
sentences.chinese: 本文将为您揭秘酒庄是如何给一瓶葡萄酒定价的。

sentences.english: and I worked for the world's largest winery, E&J Gallo, or Ernest and Julio Gallo winery.
sentences.chinese: 我在世界最大的酒庄，美国嘉露酒庄工作。

sentences.english: The white wines made in the Volnay area are sold under the Meursault appellation.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔内的白葡萄酒以墨索酒庄等级贩卖。

sentences.english: This wine is made from the highest quality hand-picked grapes grown to our exacting standards from local vineyards.
sentences.chinese: 全手工采摘的高质量葡萄全部出自酒庄自有葡萄园。

sentences.english: The winery is located in Bordeaux and was awarded with Golden Price in the Paris Competition 2008.
sentences.chinese: 酒庄位于波尔多地带，曾获2008巴黎大赛金奖。

definition: Burgundy (Bourgogne), kingdom during medieval period, now region of France
Cognac/brandy 白蘭地|白兰地[bai2 lan2 di4] from the Cognac region of southwest France
